level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Commissioner, pursuant to Chapter 5 of Title 2 [§ 2-501 et seq.], may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-143
level.text: For history of Law 19-143, see notes under § 31-631.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Because of the enactment by D.C. Law 11-159 of subchapter II of Chapter 37 of Title 35 [subchapter II of Title 31, 2001 Ed.], the preexisting text, including §§ 35-3701 through 35-3714 [§§ 31-701 through 31-714, 2001 Ed.], was designated as subchapter I.
